content.description:
Vaccine Card is the easiest way up to Â a ledge that accesses 3 longer routes above.

The crux is getting off the ground and into the chimney. After that, it is no harder than 5.8 up to the ledge. This is also the best way to descend from the ledge, it's possible to "elevator" this back to the ground.
content.location:
It is left of

Moderna

and is the red line in the picture.

content.description:
Start on loose fingers, and quickly move into fist, OW, and squeeze(the crux). Finish on diminishing quality rock up to the ledge.

Belay/rap from a tree.
content.protection: Cams #0.75 to #6 x2 (a #7 will help but is not needed).
content.location:
This is left of the

Social D Chimney

.

content.description: The crux on this is about 10 feet up on small gear. Unlike most of the routes here, the crux requires more delicate stemming and finger moves.
content.location: This is on the north-facing section. It is highlighted in blue in the picture posted.

content.description: Start in a narrow chimney, and climb up as the chimney narrows down to a squeeze, offwidth, and finally fist size. This has great climbing with bonus exit moves!
content.location:
This is just left of the

Social D Chimney

.

content.description:
Climbing through runout chimney, OW, and slab moves...everyone's favorite!

After working on this, it cleaned up quite nicely. The runout sections that are on slab and through the chimney are 5.8ish and reasonable. The hardest move, on the first pitch, is protected well especially if you have a #7, though it is not needed.
content.location: This is the rightmost climb on COVID Castle and is a long, easy to find chimney. It borders COVID Castle and "UFC Wall".

content.description: Pitch one goes through the obvious constriction up and into the cave. Pitch 2 exits up and left out of the cave. Use OW and chimney technique to the top...belay off a tree.
content.location: This is the large, bushy cave.

content.description: Climb the chimney, and top out on soft rock to the large ledge.
content.location:
It is on the right side of COVID Castle just left of

Stay at Home Order

.

content.description: This is the approach/descent to/from the shelf above COVID Castle. It is mostly 3rd Class with a 20 foot section of 5.8 OW.
content.location: This is the dirty slope that goes up the North-facing side.
